error.message:
Mockito cannot mock this class: interface java.util.List.
If you're not sure why you're getting this error, please open an issue on GitHub.
Java : 23 JVM vendor name : Oracle Corporation JVM vendor version : 23.0.1+11-39 JVM name : OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM JVM version : 23.0.1+11-39 JVM info : mixed mode, sharing OS name : Windows 11 OS version : 10.0
You are seeing this disclaimer because Mockito is configured to create inlined mocks. You can learn about inline mocks and their limitations under item #39 of the Mockito class javadoc.
Underlying exception : org.mockito.exceptions.base.MockitoException: Could not modify all classes [interface java.lang.Iterable, interface java.util.List, interface java.util.Collection, interface java.util.SequencedCollection]
